title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added version compatibility check for recommended articles in the carousel. Articles must now match the current site version (e.g., `free-pro-team@latest`).
Implemented filtering to exclude articles not available in the current version context.
Added test case verifying articles are filtered correctly when unavailable in the current version (e.g., GHEC context).
summary:
- Added version compatibility check for recommended articles in the carousel. Articles must now match the current site version (e.g., `free-pro-team@latest`).
- Implemented filtering to exclude articles not available in the current version context.
- Added test case verifying articles are filtered correctly when unavailable in the current version (e.g., GHEC context).
generated_title: Filter recommended articles by current version compatibility

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added version compatibility check for recommended articles in the carousel. Articles must now match the current site version (e.g., `free-pro-team@latest`).
- Implemented filtering to exclude articles not available in the current version context.
- Added test case verifying articles are filtered correctly when unavailable in the current version (e.g., GHEC context).

### Title
Filter recommended articles by current version compatibility
